name: Dashing Hero
description:
A very hard game to beat.

In this game your goal is to reach the end of the level.
At the end you will find the love of your life!
The hottest babe in the universe.

All you need to do is go too her.

Easy right?

KNOWN BUGS:
1. Clicking Shift once does not work at the moment. (For now: Hold a bit longer).
2. Sometimes the player gets a third jump.
